articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Goes round Construction Site of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Goes round Construction Site of Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, made a field survey of the projects for building Ryomyong Street which the High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade assumes.
					 Going round different places of the construction site, Choe Ryong Hae referred to the significance of the construction of Ryomyong Street and took measures for rapidly winding up the projects at the highest level.
					
					 He underscored the need for officers to meticulously provide supply service to the members of the shock brigade and take care of their living as their real parents would do.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Rep. Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Rep. Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Ja Song Nam, permanent representative of the DPRK to the United Nations, sent a letter to UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres on January 27.
					 The letter said:
					
					 I have the honor of writing to you to draw your attention to the enticed group abduction of DPRK citizens by the south Korean authorities, which constitutes a contemporary form of human rights violation deserving international condemnation but still remains being connived.
					
					 As already known, the south Korean authorities, engrossed with the smear campaign against the DPRK, let the agents of NIS (National Intelligence Service) commit the heinous terrorist act of alluring and abducting the DPRK's women citizens in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China in broad daylight in early April 2016 to south Korea.
					
					 In this regards I would like to recall my letter sent to your predecessor dated May 17, 2016, asking for an urgent action for the repatriation of the abducted DPRK women citizens and the letters from the families of the abductees sent respectively twice to the President of the Human Right Council (as enclosed in the Note Verbales of the DPRK Permanent Mission in Geneva Ref. No. 0036 dated 22 April, 2016 and Ref. No. 0077 dated 30 November 2016), and twice to the High Commissioner for Human Rights (as enclosed in the Note Verbales of the DPRK Permanent Mission in Geneva Ref. No. 0037 dated 22 April, 2016 and Ref. No. 0076 dated 30 November, 2016), earnestly appealing for help so that their beloved daughters return home as quickly as possible.
					
					 We cannot but express our disappointment at the fact that no action has been taken by the UN until now as we have entered 2017 without even a reply to our letters.
					
					 The United Nations and its human rights organs, true to their entrusted mandate and duty, will have to respond to the earnest demand of the families of the abductees for bringing the south Korean authorities before the court of justice and have their beloved daughters back to their parents.
					
					 I would like to take this opportunity to urge for an appropriate action by your office for an immediate repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui, a DPRK citizen who has repeatedly appealed through south Korean and international media for help so that she can return home, lamenting herself of having been tricked to south Korea in September 2011.
					
					 The enticed abduction of DPRK citizens by the south Korean authorities constitutes a crime against humanity which has resulted in division of families artificially separating parents and children. Hence how to deal with this case will be a touchstone testing the true stand of the UN for the promotion and protection of human rights.
					
					 We will not cease our struggle until the repatriation of DPRK citizens who were enticed and abducted by the south Korean authorities and will continue to seek any further action as may be required while closely following any step to be taken by the UN.
					
					 I look forward to receiving your positive reply concerning this issue.

articles.title: Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-Korean Conference
articles.content:
Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-Korean Conference
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The North Side Preparatory Committee for the Pan-national Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-South Relations issued a press release on Tuesday.
					 The press release referred to brisk preparations now under way at home and abroad for the pan-national conference against the backdrop of the desire and will of the Koreans growing stronger to open up a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and organizations of different social standings including workers, farmers, young people, women and religionists in south Korea vowed to glorify this year marking the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration as a historic year of ushering in a heyday of the country's reunification by holding the above-said conference with splendor.
					
					 The Pusan regional preparatory committee for the conference was formed on Jan. 12, which was followed by the inauguration of the south side preparatory committee for youth and students' reunification conference. And on Jan. 19, the south side preparatory committee for the conference was inaugurated in Seoul with attendance of representatives and personages from organizations of different social standings. 
					
					 The work to form preparatory committees is making progress in different areas including Seoul, Kwangju and South Kyongsang Province, and at organizations of various social standings including workers, farmers and youth and students.
					
					 Meanwhile, an overseas side working committee of the north, south and overseas joint working committee for the pan-national conference was formed on December 16 last year and various activities are now under way abroad for successfully holding the conference in conformity with the conditions in different regions.
					
					 Against the backdrop of such mounting atmosphere for opening the conference and brisk preparations for it in the north and the south and abroad, a joint working meeting is slated to take place in Shenyang of China early in February to discuss the issues related to the preparations for the pan-national conference, the release said.

articles.title: Posters Celebrating Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Produced
articles.content:
Posters Celebrating Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Produced
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Posters celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il were produced in the DPRK.
					 Given in relief on their upper parts are letters reading "75th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" and on their lower parts letters reading "The Day of the Shining Star" and "Celebrations".
					
					 The posters depict Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, Jong Il Peak, the shining sun and beautiful and red Kimjongilia in full bloom.
					
					 They include a poster representing the immense joy of the army and people, determined to celebrate with splendor the Day of the Shining Star as a holiday common to mankind, through fireworks displayed in the sky above Jong Il Peak.

articles.title: Achievements Made at Stockbreeding Bases in DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made at Stockbreeding Bases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Great achievements have been made at stockbreeding bases in the DPRK to put their production on a scientific basis.
					 Farms under the Pyongyang Poultry Production Bureau and the Kwangpho Duck Farm and Hungju Chicken Farm remarkably increased their production by establishing a system for breeding poultry in a scientific manner.
					
					 The Taedonggang Pig Farm established a system for breeding good species to save more feed and put the piglet production on a normal basis. And the integrated control system was set up there to put the livestock production on a scientific, IT and automated basis.
					
					 The Sinuiju Chicken Farm succeeded in raising the effectiveness of essential amino acids for the growth and egg-laying of poultry. It also raised the protein content of bean cake by three times.
					
					 The Hungju Chicken Farm started to produce urea protein fodder and sulphur-Kumgang medical stone activated addictive.

articles.title: DPRK Remains Unchanged in Its Stand to Mend Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Remains Unchanged in Its Stand to Mend Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK set it as a primary task to steadily improve the inter-Korean relations in the whole course of the cause of national reunification and has spared no efforts to carry it out, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to achieve the reunification of the country and prosperity of the nation through improvement of the north-south relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Its proactive measures for mending the north-south relations are prompted by the Juche-based stand to settle the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans responsible for it, the patriotic standpoint of prioritizing the requirements and interests common to the nation.
					
					 No one can replace the Korean nation in settling its issue.
					
					 When the Koreans pool their will and intention, they will have nothing impossible to settle and can properly improve the north-south relations as desired by them. 
					
					 How to approach toward improved inter-Korean relations is the touchstone distinguishing reunification from division and peace from war.
					
					 It is necessary to eliminate the anti-reunification forces to the last one in order to improve the inter-Korean relations as early as possible. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the Korean nation cannot achieve peace and the reunification of the country but may suffer irrevocable disasters of a nuclear war unless positive measures are taken to remove the obstacles to mending the north-south relations.

articles.title: Traitor Park Can Never Escape Her Miserable Fate Decided by Public: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Traitor Park Can Never Escape Her Miserable Fate Decided by Public: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea reportedly held an exclusive press conference with ultra-right conservative media on the spur of the moment on Jan. 25 at which she totally denied all her crimes, talking about "misunderstanding," "fiction," "lies," "lack of grounds for impeachment" and the like. She went to the lengths of talking rubbish that "she feels painful when thinking of conservative organization's counter-demonstration," crying out for "protecting liberal democracy" and "abiding by law."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms Park's ridiculous behavior red herring intended to get rid of the bottomless abyss of ruin and prolong her remaining days.
					
					 She called such press conference out of her increasing uneasiness about fast approaching day of the public's stern judgment, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Feeling very much fretful about her miserable fate already sealed, she is leaving no means untried to make the passed motion on her impeachment revoked come what may and return to power.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the facts that she suddenly called media persons to Chongwadae on the New Year's Day in a bid to deny all her crimes and her confidants wooed dozens of persons into standing as witnesses as part of her "tactics of delaying the ruling on the impeachment."
					
					 People's mindset represents the will of Heaven. No matter what cunning trick and desperate bid she is making, her miserable fate already decided by the public cannot be otherwise.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime for Going against Public Mindset
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime for Going against Public Mindset
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea recently pronounced a prison  sentence on Kim Sang Il, a former university professor, on absurd charges that he "followed the assertions of the north," "disseminated the Juche idea and the Songun politics" and "communicated with a member of an anti-state body".
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 This is an unpardonable challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and a blatant encroachment on human rights and democracy.
					
					 Revering and praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu cannot be regarded as crimes under any circumstances as it reflects the noble thoughts and feelings of all Koreans and their bounden duty. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservatives, in the grip of the worst ruling crisis due to the vigorous anti-government actions of people from all walks of life, are seeking their way out in intensifying the fascist suppression of people.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is now fated to go to the grave of history before long, sternly judged by the public mindset. So, it is making last-ditch efforts to get rid of the bottomless quagmire.
					
					 The group's merciless crackdown upon the progressive democratic forces on the strength of the fascist "Security Law" to prolong its remaining days has turned south Korea into a mediaeval dark land and a tundra of democracy where elementary human rights are savagely violated, to say nothing of the freedom of expression and speech.
					
					 Such fascist dictators and maniacs hell-bent on the confrontation with the compatriots will not escape a stern judgment of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Absurd Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Absurd Remarks
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on January 27 carried an editorial denouncing Park Geun Hye's absurd remarks misrepresenting the people's mindset.
					 The editorial pointed out that Park at a press conference on January 25 totally denied suspicions about her scandal, talking about "conspiratorial story".
					
					 Park's conference with conservative media was prompted by her intention to garner support in disregard of the people's mindset, it said, adding:
					
					 She is behaving as if she were a victim while refusing to respond to the investigation. This cannot be construed otherwise than the revelation of her stand not to relinquish her "power" at any cost. There is nothing to expect from her any longer.
					
					 The editorial urged the "constitutional court" to make a decision on her impeachment by promptly conducting the investigation.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary (Day of the Sun) of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary (Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Russia on January 23 with due ceremony. 
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold various political and cultural events praising the exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A DR Congo preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Kinshasa on January 23.
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from January 23 to April 15 and decided to organize such political and cultural events as meeting and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Great Leaders of DPRK Praised in DR Congo
articles.content:
Great Leaders of DPRK Praised in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will be always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives as the sun for their great feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, stressed this at a ceremony held on Jan. 23 to inaugurate the DR Congo preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, birthdays of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary said:
					
					 Today we formed a preparatory committee to celebrate the birth anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with boundless reverence for them.
					
					 The Korean people began the general offensive for hitting the target of the five-year strategy for national economic development, under the militant slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" put up by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 We will deeply grasp the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had performed to strengthen socialist Korea and achieve the national reunification and will intensify the solidarity activities of supporting the cause of justice of the Korean people advancing under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il was formed at the Socialist Party of Romania on January 20.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from January 25 to February 16 and decided to organize a joint seminar, a meeting, a film show and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, averiguo en el terreno como marcha la construccion de los edificios encargados por la Brigada de Construccion Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad.
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, Choe resalto la importancia de la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong y tomo los remedios para acelerar en el mejor nivel la construccion de edificios. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, instruyo a los oficiales a mejorar el servicio de abastecimiento para los brigadistas atendiendo con afecto paternal sus condiciones de vida.

articles.title: Representante coreano ante la ONU envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano ante la ONU envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU, Ja Song Nam, envio el dia 27 una carta al secretario general de la ONU, Antonio Guterres.
					Tras llamar la atencion al rapto en grupo de las ciudadanas de la RPDC, cometido por las autoridades surcoreanas, la misiva senala que eso constituye una forma contemporanea de violacion de DDHH que sigue siendo tolerada aunque merece la condena internacional.
					
					Da a conocer que a principios de abril del ano pasado, los compinches del "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia", instigados por las autoridades surcoreanas enfrascadas en la campana intrigante anti-RPDC, cometieron el abominable acto terrorista de seducir y raptar a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas de la RPDC en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang, y llevarlas al Sur de Corea.
					
					Hace recordar otra vez la carta remitida el 17 de mayo de 2016 al ex secretario general de la ONU solicitando una accion urgente para la repatriacion de las ciudadanas raptadas y las otras de sus familiares enviadas al presidente del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU y al alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos, adjuntadas en las notas verbales de la Representacion Permanente de la RPDC en Ginebra, fechadas el 22 de abril y el 30 de noviembre de 2016, respectivamente, pidiendoles encarecidamente la ayuda para que sus queridas hijas regresen a casa lo mas pronto posible.
					
					Expresa la decepcion del hecho de que hasta en el Ano Nuevo 2017, la ONU no ha tomado ninguna accion ni dado respuesta a esas cartas.
					
					Insiste en que la ONU y las organizaciones de DDHH de la ONU tienen que responder, de acuerdo con su mision y deber, a la encarecida demanda de los familiares de las victimas de llevar a la corte a las autoridades surcoreanas y devolver a sus hijas queridas al regazo de sus parientes.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, urge tambien que la ONU tome una accion apropiada para la repatriacion inmediata de Kim Ryon Hui, ciudadana de la RPDC quien se arrepiente de haber sido enganada para irse al Sur de Corea en septiembre de 2011 y pidio repetidamente a traves de los medios surcoreanos e internacionales la ayuda para que pueda regresar a casa.
					
					El rapto de las ciudadanas de la RPDC por las autoridades surcoreanas constituye un crimen de lesa humanidad que ha resultado en la division de familiares mediante la separacion artificial de padres e hijos, asevera y anade que la manera de tratar este caso sera la piedra de toque para probar la verdadera posicion de la ONU sobre la promocion y proteccion de DDHH.
					
					Senala que no cesara la lucha hasta la repatriacion de las ciudadanas de la RPDC, seducidas y secuestradas por las autoridades surcoreanas, y observara atentamente las futuras medidas de la ONU.
					
					Al finalizar, expresa la esperanza en la respuesta positiva del destinatario sobre ese problema.

articles.title: So Se Pyong envia carta al alto comisionado de la ONU para los DDHH
articles.content:
So Se Pyong envia carta al alto comisionado de la ONU para los DDHH
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la Oficina de la ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales en Ginebra, So Se Pyong, envio el 27 de enero una carta al alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos en Ginebra, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Le hago constar mis cumplimientos con usted y tengo el honor de escribirle nuevamente para llamar su atencion al rapto en grupo de las ciudadanas de la RPDC, cometido por las autoridades surcoreanas, el cual constituye una forma contemporanea de violacion de DDHH que sigue siendo tolerada aunque merece la condena internacional.
					
					Como ya es conocido, a principios de abril de 2016, los compinches del "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia", instigados por las autoridades surcoreanas enfrascadas en la campana intrigante anti-RPDC, cometieron el abominable acto terrorista de seducir y raptar a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas de la RPDC en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang, y llevarlas al Sur de Corea.
					
					Al respecto, quisiera recordarle mi carta enviada a usted el 17 de mayo de 2016 solicitando una accion urgente para la repatriacion de nuestras ciudadanas raptadas y las otras de sus familiares remitidas dos veces a usted (como adjuntadas en las notas verbales de la Representacion Permanente en Ginebra Ref. no. 0037 fechada 22 de abril de 2016 y Ref. no. 0076 fechada 30 de noviembre de 2016) pidiendole encarecidamente la ayuda para que sus queridas hijas regresen a casa lo mas pronto posible. 
					
					No nos queda otro remedio que expresar nuestra decepcion del hecho de que hasta en el Ano Nuevo 2017 su oficina no ha tomado ninguna accion ni dado respuesta a nuestras cartas. 
					
					Las organizaciones de DDHH de la ONU tienen que responder, de acuerdo con su mision y deber, a la encarecida demanda de los familiares de las victimas de llevar a la corte a las autoridades surcoreanas y devolver a sus hijas queridas al regazo de sus parientes. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, quisiera urgir tambien que su oficina tome una accion apropiada para la repatriacion inmediata de Kim Ryon Hui, ciudadana de la RPDC quien se arrepiente de haber sido enganada para irse al Sur de Corea en septiembre de 2011 y pidio repetidamente a traves de los medios surcoreanos e internacionales la ayuda para que pueda regresar a casa. 
					
					El rapto de las ciudadanas de la RPDC por las autoridades surcoreanas constituye un crimen de lesa humanidad que ha resultado en la division de familiares mediante la separacion artificial de padres e hijos.
					
					Pues, la manera de tratar este caso sera la piedra de toque para probar la verdadera posicion de la ONU sobre la promocion y proteccion de DDHH. 
					
					No cesaremos nuestra lucha hasta la repatriacion de las ciudadanas de la RPDC, seducidas y secuestradas por las autoridades surcoreanas, y seguiremos buscando cualquier accion que se requiera siguiendo de cerca cualquier paso que de su oficina. 
					
					Espero la respuesta positiva de usted sobre este problema.

articles.title: So Se Pyong envia carta al presidente del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU

Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la Oficina de la ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales en Ginebra, So Se Pyong, envio el dia 27 una carta al presidente del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, Joaquin Alexander Maza Martelli.

					Como ya es conocido, a principios de abril de 2016, los compinches del "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia", instigados por las autoridades surcoreanas enfrascadas en la campana intrigante anti-RPDC, cometieron el abominable acto terrorista de seducir y raptar a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas de la RPDC en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang, y llevarlas al Sur de Corea.
					
					Al respecto, quisiera recordarle mi carta (A/HRC/32/G/7) enviada a su predecesor el 17 de mayo de 2016 solicitando una accion urgente para la repatriacion de nuestras ciudadanas raptadas y las otras de sus familiares remitidas dos veces a su predecesor (como adjuntadas en las notas verbales de la Representacion Permanente en Ginebra Ref. no. 0036 fechada 22 de abril de 2016 y Ref. no. 0077 fechada 30 de noviembre de 2016) pidiendole encarecidamente la ayuda para que sus queridas hijas regresen a casa lo mas pronto posible. 
					
					No nos queda otro remedio que expresar nuestra decepcion del hecho de que hasta en el Ano Nuevo 2017 su oficina no ha tomado ninguna accion ni dado respuesta a nuestras cartas. 
					
					Las organizaciones de DDHH de la ONU tienen que responder, de acuerdo con su mision y deber, a la encarecida demanda de los familiares de las victimas de llevar a la corte a las autoridades surcoreanas y devolver a sus hijas queridas al regazo de sus parientes. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, quisiera urgir tambien que su oficina tome una accion apropiada para la repatriacion inmediata de Kim Ryon Hui, ciudadana de la RPDC quien se arrepiente de haber sido enganada para irse al Sur de Corea en septiembre de 2011 y pidio repetidamente a traves de los medios surcoreanos e internacionales la ayuda para que pueda regresar a casa. 
					
					El rapto de las ciudadanas de la RPDC por las autoridades surcoreanas constituye un crimen de lesa humanidad que ha resultado en la division de familiares mediante la separacion artificial de padres e hijos.
					
					Pues, la manera de tratar este caso sera la piedra de toque para probar la verdadera posicion de la ONU sobre la promocion y proteccion de DDHH. 
					
					No cesaremos nuestra lucha hasta la repatriacion de las ciudadanas de la RPDC, seducidas y secuestradas por las autoridades surcoreanas, y seguiremos buscando cualquier accion que se requiera siguiendo de cerca cualquier paso que de su oficina. 
					
					Espero la respuesta positiva de usted sobre este problema.
